post_message: The end of a relationship – even a years-long marriage, even an otherwise-good relationship, even with children in the mix – is, at this point, the only acceptable consequence of infidelity, and staying is posited as the inexplicable choice for a woman to make.  But life and love are more complicated than that for many people, even in 2016.
